results.title: Is insulin resistance the cause of fibromyalgia? A preliminary report
results.text_hl: In our sample of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was added to "standard treatment" for widespread @<m>DISEASE_Myofascial_Pain_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009209 @@@myofascial pain@@@.
